column3: I had a different approach based on #12578 which would a row for each *ismine* output.
@practicalswift thank you for your review.\nYour comment has been addressed.
Also this PR will fix #12688.\nDescription has been updated.

### Conflicts

Needs more review (maybe @fanquake @promag ?)\nSince @meshcollider @practicalswift commented, maybe continue with the review (ack/nack/comment).

post-merge ACK, could have used the string util `Join` for a one-liner:


```diff
diff --git a/src/qt/transactionrecord.cpp b/src/qt/transactionrecord.cpp
index 08ba030d65..24339eae17 100644
--- a/src/qt/transactionrecord.cpp
+++ b/src/qt/transactionrecord.cpp
@@ -7,6 +7,7 @@
 #include <chain.h>
 #include <interfaces/wallet.h>
 #include <key_io.h>
+#include <util/string.h>
Redundant string initialization here: `std::string address;` is enough :-)
